name: Ping (itch) (2BrosInACup)
description:
Welcome to the 2BrosInACup version of Pong called Ping! Now yes it is very similar to the original game but that is kinda on purpose. We just wanted to make Pong for fun. So hope you enjoy it, and try not to lose.

controls:

Escape = Title screen

W & S to move player 1

Up arrow and Down Arrow to move player 2
